query:
UPDATE users
            SET
                uploaded = users.uploaded +
                    CASE
                        WHEN users.id = $1 THEN $3
                        WHEN users.id = $2 THEN $3
                        ELSE 0
                    END,
                bonus_points = users.bonus_points +
                    CASE
                        WHEN users.id = $1 THEN $4
                        WHEN users.id = $2 THEN $4
                        ELSE 0
                    END
            WHERE
                users.id IN ($1, $2)
